name: Bean Boy's Epic Adventure Full Release
name_original: Bean Boy's Epic Adventure Full Release
description: In Bean Boy's Epic Adventure you will explore a non-linear world fighting enemies and collecting coins for upgrades! In your adventure you will encounter many dangerous bosses that will test your skills! You will control your character with the arrow keys or with WSAD. Pressing the space key will fire your blaster. You can use the down key to fall through platforms. To climb ladders you will need to press the up key.
